post.description: Method is used to obtain user's permanent access token by exchanging it with the access code received during the user authentication.

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation.

accessCode.description: Unique code for a user’s successful login to Connect. Returned in the response of UserLogin.

connectionID.description: The connectionID from a user’s successful log in to Connect

msg.example: Validation error on field 'connectionID'. Error: value must not be an empty string

post.description: Method is used to disconnect a user in your application from Dapi by invalidating their access token.

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation

userSecret.description: User secret returned during the successful authentication in Connect Layer

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation

userSecret.description: Returned when user authenticates in Dapi system using Connect layer

amount.description: Amount of money to be sent. Must be number rounded to up to 2 decimal points.

senderID.description: An identifier for the bank account the user will send money from  Obtained from the Account - GetAccounts endpoint

beneficiary.description: OPTIONAL. Details of amount receiver. See description of the object further in the document

type.description: Type of beneficiary. Can be set to same if the beneficiary's bank is the same as the sender's, local if the beneficiary's bank is in the same country, or intl if the beneficiary's bank is in a different country

address.description: An object containing the address information of the beneficiary

country.description: Name of the country in all uppercase letters (e.g. “AE”)

branchAddress.description: Address of the financial institution’s specific branch

branchName.description: Name of the financial institution’s specific branch

email.description: OPTIONAL. Only required for Local transfers in Canada

branchCode.description: OPTIONAL. Only required for Same bank transfers in Canada

addresses.description: OPTIONAL. Specify which webhook URL(s) defined in app settings to send data to. If empty, an update will be sent to all defined webhook URL(s)

remark.description: OPTIONAL. A message associated with the transfer

oneOf.title: Response - for banks that require a beneficiary
Response - when user input is required

query.example: Please enter a Smart Pass Token from your ENBD mobile application

oneOf.title: Response (Beneficiary Cool Down) - missing mandatory parameters

msg.example: You are attempting a transfer to a newly added beneficiary. Please try to make the transfer again after 6 hours.

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation

oneOf.title: Response - when user input is required

query.example: Please enter a Smart Pass Token from your ENBD mobile application

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation

type.description: Type of beneficiary. E.g. "same" - beneficiary's bank is the same as the sender's, "local" - beneficiary's bank is in the same country, "intl" - beneficiary's bank is in a different country. For further explanation see Beneficiary Types

address.description: An object containing the address information of the beneficiary

line1.description: Street name and number  Note: value should not contain any commas or special characters

line2.description: City name  Note: value should not contain any commas or special characters

line3.description: Country name  Note: value should not contain any commas or special characters

country.description: Name of the country in all uppercase letters (e.g. “AE”)

branchAddress.description: Address of the financial institution’s specific branch

branchName.description: Name of the financial institution’s specific branch

oneOf.title: Response - when user input is required

query.example: Please enter a Smart Pass Token from your ENBD mobile application

code-samples.code:
{
    "appSecret": "{{app_secret}}",
    "userSecret": "{{user_secret}}",
    "type": "local",
    "bankName": "Sharjah Islamic Bank",
    "name": "AbdulRahman Darooqi Farooqi",
    "nickname": "AbdulRahman SIB",
    "iban": "AE360410000033417426040",
    "country": "AE",
    "branchName": "American university of sharjah",
    "branchAddress": "AUS",
    "address": {
        "line1": "AUS",
        "line2": "University City",
        "line3": "Sharjah"
    }
}
code-samples.name: Failed Request - example

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation

userSecret.description: Returned when user authenticates in Dapi system using Connect layer

amount.description: Amount of money to be sent. Must be number rounded to up to 2 decimal points

senderID.description: An identifier for the bank account the user will send money from. Obtained from the Account - GetAccounts endpoint

receiverID.description: OPTIONAL. An identifier for the beneficiary that will receive the money. Obtained from the Get Beneficiaries endpoint. Must be specified if the bank requires receiver to be registered as beneficiary to perform a transaction

beneficiary.description: OPTIONAL. Details of amount receiver. See description of the object further in the document. Can be specified instead of receiverID, if bank does not require beneficiary registration. Must be specified together with receiverID if bank requires it for the first transaction

type.description: Type of beneficiary. Can be set to same if the beneficiary's bank is the same as the sender's, local if the beneficiary's bank is in the same country, or intl if the beneficiary's bank is in a different country

address.description: An object containing the address information of the beneficiary

country.description: Name of the country in all uppercase letters (e.g. “AE”)

branchAddress.description: Address of the financial institution’s specific branch

branchName.description: Name of the financial institution’s specific branch

email.description: OPTIONAL. Only required for Local transfers in Canada

branchCode.description: OPTIONAL. Only required for Same bank transfers in Canada

addresses.description: OPTIONAL. Specify which webhook URL(s) defined in app settings to send data to. If empty, an update will be sent to all defined webhook URL(s)

remark.description: OPTIONAL. A message associated with the transfer

userInputs.description: OPTIONAL. Array of UserInputs object. Required only if initial request responded with user inputs specification. You can read more about user inputs specification on Multi-Factor Authentication Handling

id.description: Type of input required. You can read more about user input types on User Input Types

query.description: Textual description of what is required from the user side

index.description: Is used in case more than one user input is requested. Will always be 0 If only one input is requested

answer.description: User input that must be submitted. In the response it will always be empty

oneOf.title: Response - for banks that require a beneficiary
Response - when user input is required

query.example: Please enter the OTP sent to your phone number.

oneOf.title: Failed Response - invalid date format specified

post.description: Method is used to retrieve transactions that user has performed over a specific period of time from their bank account. Every transaction in the response is categorized. Transaction categories stay the same across all banks.  Date range of the transactions that can be retrieved varies for each bank. The range supported by the user's bank is shown in the transactionRange parameter of Get Account Metadata endpoint.

appSecret.description: Private token generated at application creation

accountID.description: Bank account ID which balance is requested

toDate.description: Date to end transactions on. Format as “YYYY-MM-DD”

fromDate.description: Date to start transactions from. Format as “YYYY-MM-DD”

answer.description: User input that must be submitted. In the response it will always be empty

{
    "operationID": "e1303f1a-5146-4a91-99a6-1762726cea30",
    "success": true,
    "status": "done",
    "transactions": [
        {
            "afterAmount": 200,
            "beforeAmount": 244.1,
            "amount": 44.1,
            "currency": {
                "code": "AED",
                "name": "UNITED ARAB EMIRATES DIRHAM"
            },
            "date": "2020-03-12T19:04:11.000Z",
            "description": "ZARA",
            "details": "99392038-AlGamor",
            "category": "Shopping",
            "type": "debit",

}
